ygData.subject: Re: Third Tinkering Book
ygData.msgSnippet: I can confirm we (A full group of Lvl30+) went down there and we were running around the town when One of my party said Hey Zak they got a tinkering book
ygData.messageBody:
I can confirm we (A full group of Lvl30+) went down there and we were
running around the town when One of my party said "Hey Zak they got a
tinkering book here" I said, "Is it volume 14 or 15" he said, "No it's..."
and then some idiot Dark elf wizard pulled the whole zone down on us. He
said he believed that it was 12 or 13 and he said the price was ridiculous
in the thousands of PP range. Haven gone back yet since I don't have that
kind of cash and we went to Guk instead.


<-- Enigma -->
Follower of the Crimson Knights
http://members.door.net/enigma



-----Original Message-----
From: Chad Maloney [mailto:chadm@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 22, 1999 11:06 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Third Tinkering Book

From: Chad Maloney <chadm@...>

[sorry if this is sent multiple times. Onelist is being crappy to me]

Ok. Not to get everyone too excited, but I've heard rumors of a third
tinkering book. Someone said there are clockworks and gnomes in
Solusek A and also that there is a tinkering book for sale in there.
But it was said that is costs 7000pp. I camped last night in the entrance
to Solusek A, so I'll try to check it out tomorrow and report back. I
won't be walking out with the 7000pp book, but I'll hopefully have
the title of it *grin*.

Any confirmations of this? I did hear this directly from someone in game
inside Solusek A, so I wouldn't think it'd be wrong. How's everyone's
tinkering skill going? Any master tinkers yet or is it too expensive?

- Chad
